the entire ordeal, Michael Vick agreed to a two-year deal with Unequal Technologies, a company that produces protective padding for athletes. Michael Vick struggled at times this season with an injured rib and back. Part of the reason I'm here is because I was able to wear some rib protection this season to guide me through my injury, Michael Vick said. me. You're a pro. You're a hell of a lot better than others in this town." Howard Kurtz suspects that Donald Rumsfeld 's goal with this memoir is to leave readers with the same conclusion. But it contains few surprises and, after so many years of divisive debate, is unlikely to change many minds, writes Howard Kurtz . After an introduction by Colin Powell and NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell , the film features several NFL players giving readings from the Declaration of Independence. Dancz's score, titled "Declaration Anthem," plays throughout. You get chills thinking about how many people are going to be watching, said Dancz, who wrote the score in collaboration with a former student, Ben Leathers. Dancz said he tried not to dwell on the Super Bowl's estimated 100 million audience when he wrote the music
